statements.chinese: 我准时支付(过去)这个账单
statements.english: I paid the bill on time

statements.chinese: 这个账单准时(过去)被支付
statements.english: the bill was paid on time

statements.chinese: 这个账单将会被准时支付
statements.english: the bill will be paid on time

statements.chinese: 这个账单(已经)被准时支付
statements.english: the bill has been paid on time

statements.chinese: 这个账单(过去已经)被准时支付
statements.english: the bill had been paid on time
